QuestData.Title: Cursed to Wither
QuestData.Description: So Cedonu said he saw nightfallen going into Leyhollow?$b$bI don't like the sound of that.$b$bGrandfather seems to be holding his own, but the archmage and I will keep an eye on him. You go investigate our caves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the nightfallen that entered Leyhollow.
QuestData.RewardText: $n? Is that you, my friend?$b$b<Runas coughs violently.>
